ygData.subject: Re: Fast Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have all the time.  In Lower Guk, Sol B, and fighting shadowed men outdoors I have been been able to interrupt casters.  At 33rd my current weapon setup
ygData.messageBody:
>I have not seen a weapon hit interrupt a non-green
>spellcasting mob since about level 25. Of course if you
>really want this advantage, you'd equip different speed
>weapons in both hands to get their attacks out of synch.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

I have all the time. In Lower Guk, Sol B, and fighting shadowed men
outdoors I have been been able to interrupt casters. At 33rd my current
weapon setup is Claw and Dirk, and in most battles I usually get atleast one
interrupt against casters. In Cazic it is a different story as those
lizards cast so fast it is criminal.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
